General.Name: Evolis
General.Description: Evolis SA designs, manufactures, and markets various printing systems and plastic card personalization solutions worldwide. It offers plastic card printers, lamination printers, card lamination modules, tattoo rewrite card printers, Kiosk card printers, and financial card printers under the Primacy, CLM, Zenius, Badgy200, Avansia, Quantum, Tattoo Rewrite, Elypso, KM500B-KM2000B, KC Essential " KC Prime " KC Max kiosk, Issengo, Evolis Privelio, and Privelio XT names, as well as signature pads, and software and apps. The company also provides identification accessories, including badge holders, zips, clips, lanyards, etc. In addition, it offers consumables comprising ribbons, cards, and cleaning kits under the Evolis High Trust name. Further, the company provides project management, warranty extension, and training services, as well as tag printing solutions. It serves corporate, education, government, health, hospitality and leisure, retail, transportation, and finance markets. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Beaucouzé, France. Evolis SA is a subsidiary of Cedys & Co.
General.Address: 14, avenue de la Fontaine, Beaucouzé, France, 49070
